programme.title: Bridge Of Spies
programme.desc: James Donova is an insurance claims lawyer from Brooklyn who finds himself thrust into the center of the Cold War when the CIA enlists his support to negotiate the release of a captured American U-2 pilot. Starring Tom Hanks.

programme.title: David Blaine: Beyond Magic
programme.desc: Blaine is featured performing magic for various public figures. Also featured in this special is a stunt where Blaine catches a .22 caliber bullet in a small metal cup in his mouth. The bullet catch was performed live on stage in front of 20,000 people and Blaine fires the gun himself.

programme.title: Niall Horan: Live With The RTE Concert Orchestra
programme.desc: This TV special features Niall Horan performing nine songs from his critically-acclaimed, debut solo album, Flicker, accompanied by the world-renowned 45-piece RTE Orchestra. Filmed in Dublin during May 2018, including performances of Niall's best loved songs This Town, You And Me and Too Much To Ask.

programme.title: Elton John: The Nation's Favourite Song
programme.desc: This 90 minute special tells the story behind the 20 greatest songs ever recorded by Elton John. Mixing rich archive footage and home videos with new interviews, the documentary paints a picture of the man behind the music, telling the story of how these timeless songs came about and what impact they had on the world.

programme.title: Robot Trains S1 - EP 13
programme.desc: Set in the 'Train World' where all citizens are trains, the animation series deal with the growth of the four train heroes from exciting adventures. programme.title: Make It Count S2 - EP 9
programme.desc: Honey, we shrunk the hosts! Joakim and Charlotte gets zapped to mite-size to enter the world of teeny, tiny critters. There, they discover that ants use Maths to find the shortest routes and that bees know the concept of zero. Along the way, they realise that rivers observe pi as they meander, and the stripes on zebras and the spots on leopards are determined by Maths. It seems that Mother Nature counts on Maths, too!

programme.title: Haunted Changi
programme.desc: In January of 2010, a group of local filmmakers began exploring the famously haunted Old Changi Hospital in Singapore with terrifying and tragic results. This movie pieces together the original Haunted Changi film crew's footage to tell the full story.

programme.desc: As Reign continues to terrorize the city, Supergirl teams up with Saturn Girl. programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 40

Mecanimals are from a different world called Triforce, and have special powers to battle each other. Jason and Evan bond and realise they both need one another to find missing family members. Their quest will take them on an amazing adventure!

Created by and for children, as soon as Samy discovers it he is determined to captain a team. He sets about recruiting his closest friend Greg and Mediterranean girl Ines as defenders, quick-witted Luna as the star striker and hyperactive Joey as goalkeeper. Together they form The Team.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles S4 - EP 11

programme.title: Sky Shakers Series - EP 6
programme.desc: Z is furious over the latest report he has gotten from the Henchmen. He threatens them and informs them that he will be sending his latest Spy-Bots onto Earth. The children quarrels over whether they should approach SORA, their friendship breaks. SORA and Henchmen meets for negotiation. SORA agrees to give the Henchmen 48 Earth hours to settle their business without interaction with mankind. The Henchmen send out the Spy Bots to gather information on the Cratons.

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 6

And what is the best way to eat soup dumplings? Find out more about the allure of this collagen-rich dish on Food Notes.

programme.title: Sagrada Familia - Barcelona : Barcelona Symphony Orchestra Conducted By Kazushi Ono

On the program are works from the sacred repertoire by Vivancos, Toru Takemitsu, Mozart and Faures magnificent Requiem.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 好好说 慢慢讲 Say It ! - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Parsley = Pasir Ris? In this week's episode of Say It!, be treated to a meal of laughter and mouth-watering delicacies as Vivian and En Lai takes on the challenge of whipping up a meal with a celeb chef and learning the terms of the culinary world. (重)"滚刀"居然被以为是"boil the knife"？"Parsley"被听成"Pasir Ris"？《好好说 慢慢讲》这集恩来和怡伶要学习和食物、烹饪有关的中英词汇。恩来会到中餐馆向大厨学习各种调味料、食材、中餐烹调手法等的华语名称，然后完成不同的考题！而怡伶将和Chef Melvyn学习烹煮西餐的相关英语用词，并协助他举办聚餐，用英语为座上宾客讲解开胃菜、主餐和甜点！.

programme.desc: Focus provides timely reports and analyses on international news and current affairs from Singapore's perspective. 《焦点》追踪国际时事，实地报道区域课题，以新加坡的视角分析时局发展的前因后果和潜在影响。.

programme.title: 陈情令 The Untamed - EP 4
programme.desc: Lan Zhan is tricked into drinking by Wei Wuxian and is punished. The two go to Cold Spring to heal their wounds and accidentally fall into the secret chamber, where they encounter the ancient founder, Lan Yi. (蓝忘机)蓝湛被魏无羡施法喝酒犯规，被罚。两人来到冷泉疗伤，不小心坠入暗道 机缘巧合遇到先祖蓝翼。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 27
programme.desc: The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.title: 锁住味道 The Successor (HD) - EP 8
programme.desc: Master Xu (58) used to sell coffee for a living. Being well-liked by his customers, they gave him a nickname, Coffee. He picked up the skills of making Ngo Hiang after moving to Tiong Bahru and soon became famous there. He hopes that both the traditional taste and relationships will be passed down. 五十八岁的徐永成师傅，早年以卖咖啡为生，因为人缘好，大家都爱用Coffee这个名词叫他。Coffee师傅辗转到中巴鲁一带，努力的和前辈们学习制作五香，之后在亚美尼亚街以纯熟的手艺卖五香，打下一定的知名度。难得有人要求拜师学厨艺，希望这次锁住的不止是令人齿颊留香的回味，还有一份浓得化不开的的人情味。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 183
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change... 赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 184
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. programme.title: 名厨出走记 Love On A Plate - EP 10
programme.desc: This is a showcase of the best episodes from the award-winning series Love on a Plate. Celebrity chefs leave the comfort of their spacious kitchen into the rural areas. Using limited ingredients that are available there, they will whip up a mouth-watering feast for the villagers. 《名厨出走记》是个另类的美食节目. 制作队安排平常习惯在宽敞、设备齐全厨房工作的厨师们出走，带他们到深山林中，让他们就地取材，用巧手煮出另类料理。也借由节目，让厨师利用他们的长才为落后地区付出他们的一份力. 该节目荣获《红星大奖》多个奖项，而《精华版》更收集了该节目最精彩的集数，让观众重温厨师们的苦与乐！.

programme.title: 仁心侠旅 II The Activist's Journey S2 - EP 2
programme.desc: In the second series of The Activist's Journey, the host (Paige Chua) travels to places in Asia, where social issues and inequality breed. This series will focus on the long-standing problems that have been faced in Asia, such as shortage of food and drinking water, lack of basic medical care and the extreme marginalisation of weaker groups in society (women, children, special patients, and the poor). (重)第二系列的"仁心侠旅"，主持人前往亚洲各地去关注更多不平不公的社会现象。本系列将眼光锁定在亚洲长期存在的几个棘手问题-粮食和食水不足，基本医疗缺乏，以及弱势群体的极端边缘化。.

programme.title: 狮城有约精华版 Hello Singapore Highlights - EP 200
programme.desc: Deliver social features that matter to you. 总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。.

programme.title: 攻星计 After The Stars - EP 14
programme.desc: Filming for Zi Yi's first movie begins, celebrity director Bang Xing appears to be arrogant and bossy on set. Guo Yu and Tian Ai find out that the shots Bang Xing produced contains many issues, and call for a meeting with Bang Xing and the Cameraman. Bang Xing fails to show any signs of repentance and gets a scolding from Guo Yu. 姿意首部电影开拍，明星导演邦兴在片场颐指气使。国瑜和天爱发现邦兴拍的镜头很有问题，召见邦兴和摄影师。邦兴不知悔改，国瑜把他臭骂一顿。.

programme.title: 晨光第一线 Morning Express - EP 200
programme.desc: (Live) A daily brand new News belt, from Monday to Friday, 9am - 9.30am. （现场直播）全新新闻时段，每逢星期一至五，早上九点，准时送上。.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 15
programme.desc: (15A) Weijia plans to centralise the eatery's delivery service. Li'an indicates that they can expand the eatery business into Mainland China. Yi'ai proposes to be the vanguard and go to Shanghai. Yongzheng and Liying blame each other for favouring Weijia, causing Yi'ai to have thoughts of leaving Hong Kong. (15B) Yi'ai and Li'an encounter Liang Zan and Mr Zhang while having dinner. Li'an is forced to drink with them. Yi'ai sends the drunk Li'an home, and is pulled to bed by Li'an. Yi'ai kisses (15A)围家针对茶餐厅的外卖问题，建议把外卖中央系统化。立安表示茶餐厅业务可提早进军内地，以爱闻言主动提出到上海作开荒牛。 永正、丽荧互相责备，认定是对方过于偏心围家，令以爱想离港。(15B)以爱与立安用膳时碰巧遇到梁赞及张总，立安被灌得大醉。以爱送立安回家，却被立安醉醺醺地拉上床，以爱忍不住亲吻他。.

programme.title: 歌台星力量 兴-旺-发 大决赛 GeTai Challenge 2018 Grand Finals - EP 1

programme.title: 便宜有好货 Cheap & Good - EP 9
programme.desc: A brand new combination of hosts, Kym Ng, Shane Pow and Tang Ling Yi will explore and share money-saving tips and useful information on getting the best value buys in town! In this episode, our celebrity guest Tracy Lee will share her creative money-saving tips with viewers! 在物价高涨的今天，每个人都面对生活压力，所以我们要在日常生活里的"衣·食·住·行"找出更多省钱妙招，更精明的花每一分赚来的钱，而且打造比较优质的生活。三位主持人钟琴、包勋评和汤灵伊将带大家穿街走巷找寻便宜有好货的宝地！这个星期的艺人嘉宾李美玲将会与观众分享有创意的省钱贴士！.

programme.title: 绳之以法 2019 Crimewatch 2019 - EP 10
programme.desc: Watch how officers from the Criminal Investigation Department and Technology Crime Investigation Branch conducted extensive investigation and eventually arrested the suspects within 2 weeks from the reported crime. programme.title: 甜心格格 Ori Princess Sr 3 - EP 50
programme.desc: A cheeky girl learns the do's and don'ts of palace life when she enters the palace as a princess. 《甜心格格》将古代宫廷背景与现代时尚相结合，故事既富有娱乐性，又能体现出中华民族传统的诚实、仁义、勇敢等美德。.

programme.title: 星锁 Looking For Stars - EP 3

programme.title: 心点心 Heart To Heart - EP 12
programme.desc: A white hair lady came looking for Wen Guang but he was not around. Xiao Li was humming the dim sum song while working, when the white hair lady commented that the way she sings is wrong. Xiao Li challenged her, attracting everyone to her singing. It turns out the white hair lady is Wen Guang's mother, Feng Zhu, also the "dim sum flower" of the teahouse in the past. Feng Zhu asks Wen Guang to sell off his shares of the teahouse, Wen Guang refuse. 一个满头白发的女人来找文广，文广正好不在。萧丽边工作边哼起点心歌，白发女人却说她唱得不对。萧丽挑战她，对方遂大展歌喉，大家都被歌声吸引。原来她是文广的妈妈，当年茶楼的"点心之花"凤珠。凤珠要文广卖掉茶楼股份，文广不肯。.

programme.title: 小毛病大问题 Body SOS Sr 8 - EP 27
programme.desc: In this episode, we will be learning and doing eye screening for "Cataract" with live audience! In Singapore, cataract affects around 80% of people over the age of 60 years! What are the symptoms? Obesity, diabetes and hypertension have been linked to cataract? Why? Do cataracts really need to be "ripe" for surgery? TCM physician will also teach us simple eye exercise that you can do anytime! 这一集的户外实习课要研讨的课题是“白内障”！在本地有将近80%的年长人士有白内障的问题！有哪些症状呢？肥胖、糖尿病、高血压都和白内障有关联？白内障不一定要等到“熟”了才动手术？真相是什么？！医师也会教大家眼珠保健操！.

programme.title: 前线追踪 Frontline - EP 39
programme.desc: Frontline is a weekly investigative current affairs programme that aims to address issues closest to the hearts of Singaporeans. 民情、民生、民意！【前线追踪】紧跟社会民生步伐，追踪调查时事动态，探讨新加坡人关心的课题，针对问题的核心追根究底。.

programme.title: 攻星计 After The Stars - EP 15
programme.desc: Xiao Min complains that she was molested by Bang Xing, her father Jiang Han threatens to sue. Xiao Min is willing to convince Jiang Han to let it rest if Guo Yu agrees to be her boyfriend. Zhen Mei suspects the motive behind Zhang Lan matchmaking Guo Yu and Xiao Min, looks into it secretly, discovering a shocking secret! 晓敏投诉遭邦兴非礼，其父江汉扬言提告。晓敏表示如果国瑜答应当她的男朋友，便会劝阻父亲。甄美怀疑张岚欲撮合国瑜和晓敏的动机，暗中调查，发现一个惊人的秘密！.

programme.title: 小农夫 2 Fresh Farmers 2 - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Let's see what our little farmers, Shantosh Elvis s-o Theivanayagam and mother, Chen Kai En and her mother, are going to do at the banana farm. Are they able to select healthy buds for transport to a bigger field? They will have their first-hand experience to harvest the fruit, clean the fruits and use bananas to make an art craft. (重)这一集让我们看看小农夫昱阳和陈凯恩以及他们的妈妈，会在香蕉园干些什么活呢？他们是否能正确地筛选出健康的幼芽栽种在园中？他们将会亲手收割香蕉，清洗香蕉，而两个小农夫还会用香蕉来做手工呢！.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 80
programme.desc: (R) This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. (重)在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 我家是联合国 Home Of United Nations - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Pei Qi grew up in a well-to-do family. As a result of a turn of events, her parents decided to offer their services as student caretakers, and converted their bungalow into a "student hostel" for international kids. From then on, children from all over the world started to move in. These kids from different countries were initially resistant and dismissive of one another. As Pei Qi witnesses their loneliness and yearning for home, she puts herself in their shoes and finally realizes how fortunate she is. Pei Qi starts to reach out and make friends with them. Through mutual support and learning, they built a sincere friendship that transcends geographical boundaries. (重)一个从小生活在富有家庭的小千金佩娸(14岁),因为父親生意失敗,不得以將原本宽裕的洋房改为〞学生宿舍〝. 从此面对来自中囯,韓囯,印尼,俄罗斯和印度等不同国家的学生,….

programme.title: 少年师爷 Little Counsellor Season 11 & 12 - EP 0037 & 0038
programme.desc: The Young Xiao Shiye is known for his strong sense of justice and integrity. He uses his wisdom and wit to solve the people's daily problems and many challenges. 小师爷真名施野，极富侠气和正义感。日常生活中，用自己的智慧和勇气，克服各种困难，帮周围的人解决了大大小小的麻烦，维护了正义和公理。.

programme.title: 全民出来走走 SG Explorers - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Experts claim that Bukit Brown is a rare outdoor history museum, but what makes it so special? What is its history? There is even a lesser known cemetery in there, but where is it? Let Vivian Lai and Jiang Jian Wen bring everyone along on a trip to find out. (重)专家学者们认为武吉布朗是不可多得的户外历史博物馆，究竟它有什么魅力？有什么历史？还有新加坡少为人知的墓园，究竟在哪里？让赖怡伶和江坚文带领大家去走一趟，了解一下。.

programme.title: 食来运转 Good Food On Sunday - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) What kind of spark will happen when a good temper Ah Gong meet an impetuous Ah Ma. Full of laughter and wonderful spark you never expected. Chef Pung show you how to combine pork floss with deep fry tofu into a delicious dish. (重)好脾气的阿公遇到急性子的阿嬷会擦出怎样的火花？他们每个妙语连珠，现场笑料不断。厨艺精湛，强手过招、精彩连连。看资深名厨冯洱讯，如果将猪肉丝与炸豆腐相结合。.

programme.title: 黄金年华之斗歌竞艺 Golden Age Talentime - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) A popular singing competition which provides the elderly with a platform to showcase their singing talent. (重)这个深受乐龄人士欢迎的歌唱比赛为爱唱歌的乐龄朋友提供了演出的平台。.

programme.title: 挑战不可能 3 Challenge The Impossible S3 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Sa Beining, Challenge The Impossible (Sr3) presents exciting challenges taken on by daredevils from around the world. The panel of judges include Li Changyu, Harlem Yu, Sun Yang and Dong Qing. Tune in to see who among the contestants will win the approval of the judges. (重)励志挑战节目《挑战不可能 第三季》由撒贝宁担任主持人，节目呈献难度极高且不可思议的各种挑战，将给观众带来惊心动魄的感官体验。节目也邀请华人神探李昌钰，台湾名歌星庾澄庆，中国奥运游泳冠军孙杨和著名艺人董卿担任评委。.

programme.title: 舞蔬弄果 Fruit, Veggies & Me - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Discover the health benefits of various fruits and vegetables, they are useful in reducing blood sugar levels, boosting calcium levels in the elderly & improving children's immunity. (重)每一集着重介绍一种蔬果，带出此蔬果最常被人忽略的营养部分，并教导观众如何创意使用/食用蔬果，重新发掘蔬果好玩又有益的部分。.

programme.title: 回家 Home Truly - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Pei Zhi decides to follow Jian Feng back to Singapore and return to Dong Bo. However, Dong Bo avoids them and wants Jian Feng to take good care of her. Sheng Quan tells Dong Bo that Pei Zhi is staying in the fish farm and persuades him to face the problem. Dong Bo thinks that Pei Zhi is in Singapore for Jian Feng. (PG)(重)沛芝决定回到东博身边，随剑锋回到新加坡，但东博却对他们避而不见，只是要剑锋好好照顾沛芝，剑锋不解。盛泉告诉东博，沛芝一直留在渔场，东博认为她是为了剑锋而留下的。盛泉劝东博勇敢面对他们，才能解决问题。.

programme.title: 回家 Home Truly - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Jian Feng returns Pei Zhi her heirloom longevity necklace as he has no idea why he is in a three-way relationship with her and Dong Bo. Pei Zhi knows that he likes Jing En. He is willing to do anything for her as he already knew she is not his biological sister. Jian Feng is confused when Pei Zhi asks him to face his feelings. (PG)(重)剑锋将长命锁还给沛芝，不解自己怎么会卷入她和东博之间的感情问题。沛芝直言知道剑锋心里只有静恩，因为他早就知道静恩不是他的亲妹妹，才会为她无条件的付出，她劝剑锋正视与静恩的关系，剑锋感迷惑。.

programme.title: 叛逆战队 Devil's Blues - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) With the arrival of the new century, crime is constantly manifesting itself in different ways. The new era brings forth prosperity and at the same time, a host of new deviant patterns from the young generation. Traditional methodology to fight crime is no longer effective in these times of swift changes. The police hence decide to set up a task force specializing in new-age criminology, getting the youths themselves to combat youth crimes: the Devil Drifters team is born! (重)故事讲述叛逆战队统帅狄军一直带领着战队以非一般的办案方式与超乎常规的手段，破获了不少一般警察不能应付的另类案件。狄军一直尽忠职守，但由于环境关系，他办案时所采用的非常手段却未能得到警方高层的支持和谅解，反而惹来了常规警员的非议与否定，而狄军在一次行动中，更落得有队员惨死的收场，令高层下令解散战队，幸而在狄军据理力争之下，终于换来一次证明自己的最后机会，上级决定派人到战队监察，为期三个月，藉此决定战…….

A special celebrity will turn up at the doorstep of the winner's home! (重)(最后一集)《客人来咯！》每集将邀请两个家庭比赛，分享他们的家面对什么疑难杂症，并在参考设计师提供的建议后，为房子进行改造，改善家居问题。主持人李国煌和田铭耀将各自带领一个家庭，监督他们在特定的预算和时间内购买家具和摆设品，重新为房子整装。.

Fun Lab aims to make science come alive with fun science experiments and through fun, engage kids and help them get excited about science. In each episode, different experiments will be carried out, with lots of questions being asked to get the viewers interested and constantly keep them guessing. (重)《疯狂实验室》节目宗旨主要在于让孩童们体验科学实验的趣味，以加强他们对于科学常识的认识。节目从生活出发，以趣味性十足的科学实验作为手段，再以趣味性作为辅助，让科学实验激发孩童们学习科学的兴趣，培养儿童对于科学探究的好奇心。《疯狂实验室》通过戏剧手法，融合丰富的科学资讯，讲述三名可爱小朋友小恩、小俊和小楷对各种生活事物的观察，事物如何引起他们的好奇和探索求知的欲望，驱使他们去找寻答案。.

programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

programme.desc: (R) Food is an energy source of mankind. What's the difference between traditional food and new food types? (重)食物，是人类的能量来源。传统食品和新型食品，究竟有什么不一样？在本集节目中，李腾将带领观众认识蟹肉棒的生产原料及制作过程。他也会介绍各式各样的仿荤素食以及新型食品，看看这些食物如何丰富我们的饮食文化。.

programme.title: 开门见餐 Home Dining - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Daphne Ang has spent 7 years living in Japan. From convenience store's onigiri to exquisite kaiseki, Japan has enriched her with many wonderful dining experiences. Now back in Singapore, she loves to share simple recipes with parents and encourage them to cook for their children. Her menu includes Ponzu Handama, Tamago Yaki, Vegetable Nimono, Sushi and etc. They are easy to prepare, but how? Let's find out in "Home Dining"! (重)曾旅居日本长达7年的洪宁新，目前是一个孩子的母亲。她非常注重"家的味道"，并鼓励父母多为孩子们下厨做饭。她喜欢自己研发易做易学的食谱跟大家分享，包括今天出现在菜单里的金时草沙拉、玉子烧、莲藕香菇煮物和寿司等。你是否也有兴趣学两招？欢迎你一起来"开门见餐"！.

programme.title: 新过番客 A Sojourn Home - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) "A Sojourn Home" follows foreign workers from India, Bangladesh, the Philippines, Myanmar, Indonesia and more who came to Singapore to find a living. The series documents how some make it big and return home with affluence, while others are disappointed and forced to leave crestfallen. The series highlights their determination and will-power to succeed, showing us a side of foreign workers we normally do not see. (重)《新过番客》关注着一些来自印度，孟加拉，菲律宾，缅甸，印度尼西亚国家等等的外劳。他们离家背景，远来到新加坡发展和赚钱养家。这一系列的纪录片让我们看到他们的成功与失败，有些富裕的回到家乡，有些却因失败而被迫离开。这纪录片显示了他们坚强的意志，决心和勇往直前的精神，让我们看到他们的另一面。.

(重)怡婷即将移植肾脏给崇德，开心不已。崇德提出想去拜祭父母，告诉他们这件事，还叫怡婷去买水果。不料怡婷拿着水果回来时，惊见崇德车祸身亡。怡婷大受打击，郭瑶和国瑜安慰。.

programme.title: 小城花样多 Small Town Surprises - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In this week's Small Town Surprises, Hui Xin and the Leung Family set foot on the Little Fuzhou of Perak, Sitiawan! Our Leung siblings have a taste of their self made Fuzhou pastry. They witness how bird's nest is processed and have their knowledge of Chinese myths tested in a fun and exciting riddle competition. (重)这个星期的《小城花样多》，女城管慧馨带领着梁家来到了拥有“小福州”之称的实兆远！看我们梁家的成员如何学习制作福州光饼的诀窍！梁家兄妹也亲眼目睹了燕窝采摘和加工过程的艰辛。最后，梁家成员必须根据城管所发出的谜题，寻找与中华文化和民间故事有关的雕像！.

programme.title: 星锁 Looking For Stars - EP 5
孤男寡女 Yours Fatefully - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Xin Xin and Xiao Yi ran into Zhi Guo in a pub. Zhi Guo challenged Xiao Yi to a drinking contest and Xiao Yi's gastric pains resulted. Zhi Guo dragged away a tipsy Xin Xin when Xiao Yi was vomiting in the toilet. The two of them returned together the next day causing Xiao Yi to misunderstand the two of them spent the previous night together. Xin Xin tries her best to explain but it fell on deaf ears. (重)心心和治国、孝义三人在酒廊碰见，治国挑衅孝义，和他一起斗酒。孝义胃痛发作，跑到厕所呕吐，治国趁机带走喝醉的心心。第二天，治国和心心一起回来，孝义误会两人共度一夜，心心解释无效。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste of Life - EP 301
programme.desc: Zhao Ju Cai and his wife Li Jin Xiu have five children. Devoted all his life to developing soy sauce products, much as Zhao Ju Cai hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's pursuit of invention, the Zhao brothers' lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 心点心 Heart To Heart - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Kimberly's parents are planning a nostalgia dinner for their pearl anniversary, and was persuaded by Kimberly and Feng Zhu to hold the dinner at Yue Xiang Lou. They were looking forward to Yue Xiang Lou's signature dishes of the past, but the main chef, Liang Ge responded by saying he did not know how to cook those dishes. Feng Zhu was disappointed that the recipe and skills was lost. Tian Hua reminds Wen Guang to act according to his capabilities and not to make matters worse. (PG)(重)Kimberly父母准备办一个古早味的特别晚宴，庆祝两人的珍珠婚。Kimberly和凤珠联手，说服他们在《越香楼》办宴席。两老期待吃到当年的招牌菜，主厨亮哥却说他不会煮那些菜，凤珠不满当年的名菜竟然后继无人。天华则提醒文广要量力而为，不要弄巧反拙。.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 16

programme.title: 极件任务 Mission Delivery - EP 9
programme.desc: Dounan Flower Market in Kunming China is known as the largest flower wholesale market in Asia. Do you know that their flowers have to go through auction every day? Let's follow the host to find out the daily operations in the market and also learn how these flowers were shipped to overseas from China. 玫瑰自古就是爱情与美好的象征，带刺却又脆弱的它，在抵达消费者手中以前，究竟经历了多少人的呵护与把关呢？这一集，特派员来到了花都昆明，一窥亚洲最大花市里的日常作业，了解这些鲜花是如何被运往我国的。.

programme.title: 天蝎行动 Coup De Scorpion - EP 30
programme.desc: (R) The story begins with Ye Lin being sent to South Africa on work assignment where she meets the dashing Xie Ting Zhang. In a whirlwind of romance, the couple falls in love and exchange marital vows. Tragedy strikes when Xie gets mysteriously killed by mobsters. The disheartened Ye returns to Singapore and starts life anew in a jewelry group run by young entrepreneur Zheng Nan Shun. Nan takes a liking to Ye and begins to pursue er. Just as Ye was about to accept and marry Nan, Yan resurfaces.... (重)《天蝎行动》主要讲述，被骗至南非数载，全部家产都被 郑南顺 (李南星 饰) 的父亲夺走的 谢廷璋 (李铭顺 饰) 与年轻的珠宝鉴定师 叶林 (陈松伶 饰) 在南非相爱成婚。因为黑吃黑被黑帮追杀，廷璋诈死后来到新加坡才知道郑父已故，廷璋发现不知内情的南顺继承了大笔财产而且对叶颇有好感，为复仇廷璋制定了“天蝎行动”，并放弃了叶林，与同被郑父害死父母的律师王重光配合，先帮南顺对付他的对手郭保罗，令郭保罗生意破产，公司也被南顺收购。并助南顺登上珠宝业主席的宝座。同时南顺向叶林求婚成功。然而就在南顺和叶林注册的那一天，郑母出车祸身亡，买凶杀人的郭保罗逃走了。而南顺将和叶林结婚的前夕，又收到叶林当年和廷璋在南非结婚的资料。此事对叶林伤害极深，她在教堂逃婚了。.

Tian Hua realised the Char Siu Pau Na La made taste exactly the same as in the past. He started to suspect Na La's identity. Wen Guang is thankful for Na La's help and invites her to join Yue Xiang Lou again, but Na La refuse. (PG)(重)在娜拉帮忙下，《粤香楼》重现当年经典美味，尤其是"开口笑"叉烧包，更是受到众宾客的赞赏。天华发现叉烧包的味道竟然和当年的一模一样，开始怀疑娜拉的身份。文广感激娜拉的帮忙，再次邀请她加入，娜拉不置与否。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 72
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 溏心风暴 3 Heart And Greed S3 - EP 17
programme.desc: (Part 1) The Xus and Huangs set sail on their new yacht. Yongzheng suffers seasickness. Yadun sneaks into the cabin to ask Yongzheng about the acquisition of Zhongtian Online, to which Yongzheng agrees without much thought. (PG)(第17集上)许、黄两家出海试新游艇。永正晕船休息时，雅顿悄悄问他购入内地中天网的意愿，永正草率答应。.

programme.title: 节庆。风味 A Taste of Festival - EP 2
programme.desc: The different Chinese dialect groups have different traditional CNY dishes. The Hokkiens enjoy steamboat, Fried Mee Sua & Ngoh Hiang while the Hainanese cannot miss their Chap Chye during CNY. Let's learn to cook Buddha Jumps Over the Wall & Steamed Fish Maw with Chef KT & a home chef respectively. 不同籍贯的华人，有着不同的传统年菜。福建人会在新年享用暖炉、福建炒面线和五香肉卷等等美食，而海南人的餐桌上则少不了海南杂菜。主持人不仅请来厨师杨建忠指导烹煮佛跳墙，也拜访家厨一窥海南年菜蒸鱼鳔的做法。.

programme.title: 攻星计 After The Stars - EP 18
programme.desc: Tian Ai recalls how she was once together with Guo Yu, Guo Yu's heartlessness causes her to cry her eyes out, questioning him the reason of the breakup. Guo Yu tells Tian Ai the real reason and also reveals that he cannot go against Zhang Lan. Tian Ai is extremely hurt. (PG)天爱想起与国瑜相爱以及分手的往事，对国瑜的绝情伤心欲绝，质问他当年为什么要放弃两人的感情。国瑜说他无法违抗张岚的命令，指出两人无法在一起的原因，天爱痛苦不已。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: Daily evening updates on top local news and world news. 《晚间新闻》每日为您提供最全面的本地与全球新闻报道。.

programme.title: 生产者 Food Producers S1 - EP 8
programme.desc: The show takes you to the origins of Malaysian food products, capturing how local manufacturing companies operate, survive and overcome problems. 这个节目将带您了解马来西亚食品的起源，捕捉当地制造企业的经营方式，生存和克服问题的方式。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The competition for business between aesthetic doctors and plastic surgeons is getting tough. On top of that, Vincent and his team must keep in line with strict medical regulations that limit the type and reach of clinical advertising. What can Vincent's clinic do in the face of strong competition? (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)整形外科医生与医学美容医生的商业竞争越来越强。身为整形外科专家，姚国龙医生和他的团队必须遵守严格的医药条例。这无形中限制了诊所的宣传方式与范围。面对强烈的竞争，姚国龙医生有何对策？.

programme.title: 你也是人类吗 Are You Human - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Nanxin tries to loosen himself from the control of his grandfather and the PK Group to look for his long lost mother Lula in the Czech Republic. To do so, he is even willing to tarnish his own reputation. He makes use of Xiaofeng to take intimate photos of him and a woman with whom he is involved in a scandal, and after hitting her, he surreptitiously leaves and boards the plane to the Czech Republic while the security officers are busy maintaining order. However, little does he know that he has been followed. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)南信为了要摆脱爷爷与PK集团的控制，去捷克寻找失散多年的妈妈露拉，不惜毁掉自己的名声，在机场借小凤之手偷拍与绯闻女人的亲密照片并打了她后，趁着保安队长忙着维持秩序时偷偷地离开，上了前往捷克的飞机。 但他料想不到自己已被人跟踪上机了。.

programme.title: 你也是人类吗 Are You Human - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Yongxun tries all means to locate Nanxin's whereabouts. He finds Lula's house where he discovers that Nanxin is in severe coma. Yongxun tells Lula that PK Group is in crisis now as Xu Zhongji is determined to get rid of Nanxin and take over the company. Lula knows that Yongxun is the only one that Nanxin can trust so she decides to deploy Robot Nanxin 3 to replace Nanxin to guard over whatever he has. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)永勋通过各种方式查到南信的行踪，找到露拉的家，却发现南信已重度昏迷。永勋告诉露拉PK公司现在危机重重，徐钟吉一心想干掉南信，夺走公司。露拉知他是南信唯一可以信任的人，决定让南信3号机器人回去顶替南信守护现在的一切。.

programme.title: 谁来晚餐2019 Guess Who 2019 - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Celebrities will be invited to visit a family and join them for dinner. The family will have no idea who the celebrity will be beforehand. The invited celebrity will share his or her experience with the family through conversation during a meal. (重)“谁来晚餐”是个时下颇为流行的实况电视节目. 每集节目都拜访一个家庭,并邀请他们的梦幻嘉宾上门共进晚餐.内容没有太多刻意的安排, 也许是小小梦想的完成, 也可能会看到名人卸下包装与身段之后的真情流露。.

programme.title: 极境之旅 Forbidding No More - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) In this episode of "Forbidding No More" adjourned to the Cuban town of Vinales where it is known for its special karst terrain. Vinales is also the hometown of cigar production and tobacco. (重)离开了热情洋溢的哈瓦那，《极境之旅》继续往下一个古巴城镇云尼斯山谷进发。这里有着特殊的喀斯特地形，更是雪茄的生产重镇和烟叶的故乡。主持人将在这里经历哪些极境体验？又将领略何种古巴风情？.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 33
programme.desc: (R) Yingshan looks forward to a dinner date with Xuncai. However, Xuncai forgets about the date when Dongchu faints at home suddenly. Yingshan is displeased when she feels that Xuncai has neglected her. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英善开心地到餐厅跟勋才约会。但东出突然晕倒，勋才陪在真爱家人的身边，忘了赴约。英善觉得勋才重视真爱和她的家人多过重视她，非常不满。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 28
programme.desc: (R) Xiaohong knows that it is wrong of her to have cheated Huaxin of the ten million won. She braces up and confesses to Meishu and Zhiying on what she has done. The two mothers and uncle Le are furious when they know what has happened. They punish Daqiu, Zhilie and Xiaohong. The three of them discuss how to return the money to Huaxin... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)小红知道自己当初从叔叔华信那里骗走了一千万是不对的，于是鼓起勇气拿着这一千万向美淑和智英坦承了自己的过错。两个妈妈和乐叔得知后勃然大怒，惩罚大邱、致烈和小红。三人商量如何将钱还给华信......

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 45
programme.desc: Chengjun does not return home for days. Xiangxie assumes that he is avoiding Zhenhua, but Chengjun is actually checking on the accident that led to his father's death. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)廷恩要贤宇冷静地跟她谈论当年的事件，否则向街坊揭穿他的真实身份及搬到社区的目的。贤宇执意报仇，就算对廷恩还有感情也不想理会她。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 46
programme.desc: Chengjun does not return home for days. Xiangxie assumes that he is avoiding Zhenhua, but Chengjun is actually checking on the accident that led to his father's death. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)成俊几天不回家，享燮以为他是因为想躲避贞华才不回家的。殊不知，成俊其实一直在调查当年车祸的点滴。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 8
programme.desc: Last September, a tsunami swept across the city of Palu, Indonesia. Many were dead, while many went missing. Some bodies were not recovered and families continue to search for hope. A year of silence, a year of searching, and a year of waiting in anxiousness. But how long can this hope last? 去年九月，一场无情的海啸让许多印度尼西亚帕卢市居民家破人亡。这场灾害造成多人伤亡，至今仍有多人下落不明。对有些家属来说，只能无限的等待和寻找，因为遗体未被发现，就是一线希望。.

programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 20
programme.desc: Taizhu fainted and finds himself back in 2018 upon waking up. He finally makes it back home where the people he had heard in his dreams welcome him back. Meanwhile, Jin Minshuo is out to commit a crime again. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)泰柱经过短暂的昏迷，清醒后发现回到2018年。他看到了在自己梦中一直和自己说话的主治医生张元在，声音、相貌都与他梦中的不差分毫。此时，金民硕再次干案。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Last September, a tsunami swept across the city of Palu, Indonesia. Many were dead, while many went missing. Some bodies were not recovered and families continue to search for hope. A year of silence, a year of searching, and a year of waiting in anxiousness. But how long can this hope last? (重)去年九月，一场无情的海啸让许多印度尼西亚帕卢市居民家破人亡。这场灾害造成多人伤亡，至今仍有多人下落不明。对有些家属来说，只能无限的等待和寻找，因为遗体未被发现，就是一线希望。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Last September, a tsunami swept across the city of Palu, Indonesia. Many were dead, while many went missing. Some bodies were not recovered and families continue to search for hope. A year of silence, a year of searching, and a year of waiting in anxiousness. But how long can this hope last? programme.title: 你也是人类吗 Are You Human - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Thinking he has gotten rid of Nanxin, Zhongji gleefully prepare to host the autonomous car presentation and make a mark for himself. When Nanxin alights from the car out of the blue, Zhongji is shocked and furious. Nanxin goes on to present the features of the unmanned autonomous car flawlessly, but Zhongji deliberately poses a difficult question on how any accident will be dealt with to cause Nanxin embarrassment. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)钟吉本以为已除掉了南信，很高兴地要开始主持无人驾驶汽车发表会大放光彩时，南信突然从车上走了下来，令钟吉感到震惊和生气。在南信完美解说无人驾驶自助汽车的功用之时，他特意抛出了一个难题，让南信解说一下车子遇到事故之时的处理方式, 要让他难堪。.

programme.title: 你也是人类吗 Are You Human - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Nanxin becomes a national hero after he saved some people in a fire. While Nanxin is getting mobbed by the media and receiving flowers from fans, Xiaofeng specially comes to thank Nanxin for saving her life. It turns out that Xiaofeng and reporter Zhao has been bribed by Zhongji to expose Nanxin's fabricated scandal with the woman, in front of the reporters. (重)南信在火灾事故中挽救人们的生命后，成为国民的英雄。就在倍受媒体的瞩目和在其他崇拜者来给南信献花时，小凤特意来给南信道谢，感激他的救命之恩。原来小凤和赵记者被钟吉收买，要在其他记者面前，揭露南信在机场故意被偷拍的事情。.

programme.title: 看见你的声音 I Can See Your Voice - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) "I Can See Your Voice" is a reality show in which guests must attempt to determine whether the contestant is a skilled vocalist or a tone-deaf contestant without hearing them sing. (重)《看見你的声音》是一档嘉宾凭视觉判断选手是否专业演唱实力还是音痴的新概念推理类音乐综艺节目。.

programme.title: 梦行者 Dream Walkers - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Di Lun follows Tang Ning around for the entire night, more convinced than ever that she sleepwalks. He then discovers a series of clues, such that she was possibly trafficked from Singapore to KL, and the fact that she recognizes the toy Di Lun gave to Chu Qing, plus her fear for fireflies, possibly due to the mysterious blue fireflies she has encountered. All these lead to the suspicion that Tang Ning can very well be Chu Qing. (PG)(重)狄伦跟着唐凝梦游了一个晚上，确认了她真的有梦游症。过后得知她可能被人拐带，从新加坡到吉隆坡。接着又发现她认得当年狄伦送给初晴的玩具；加上唐凝害怕萤火虫，或许是因为当年被神秘的“蓝色萤火虫"吓着。狄伦越来越觉得，唐凝有可能就是初晴。.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 34
programme.desc: (R) Yingshan appoints Shen Yuxi as head of the Planning Department. Yuxi criticizes Zhen-ai on her first day of work. Zhen-ai takes the humiliation lying down. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英善聘请申俞希担任企划组组长。俞希第一天到公司开会就严厉地批评真爱并羞辱她，真爱忍气吞声。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 29
programme.desc: (R) Huaxin collects his medical report from the hospital and finds out from the doctor that the chemotherapy has made him infertile. He is despaired and doesn't know how to tell Nali about it. On the other hand, rumours that Nali has breast cancer spread in the TV station. (PG-些许性相关语)(重)(双声道-中/韩)华信去医院拿自己最后的体检结果，听医生说自己因化疗而导致不孕，整个人陷入绝望中，不知如何将这消息告诉娜丽。另外，在电视台里传出了娜丽得了乳腺癌的传闻。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 47
programme.desc: Chengjun finally asks Xiangxie if he has caused the death of his birth father. Xiangxie refuses to tell Chengjun anything about his background and scolds Chengjun for being ungrateful. Ting'en contemplates telling Xiangxie about Xianyu's real identity. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)成俊终于开口问享燮是否是他害死他的亲生父亲。享燮不肯告诉成俊他的身世，反而生气地骂成俊忘恩负义。廷恩想向享燮说出贤宇的身份，却欲言又止。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 48
programme.desc: Chengjun raises his voice at Xiangxie at home as he feels more and more unhappiness towards Xiangxie. Zhenhua gives Chengjun a beating, but Xiangxie stops her and orders her to leave home. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)成俊因为对享燮很不谅解，在家里顶撞享燮，令家人们很吃惊。贞华对成俊拳打脚踢，不但被享燮制止，还要要贞华离开他的家，回美国。贞华觉得委屈不已。.

programme.title: 台湾1001个故事 3 Taiwan's 1001 Stories 3 - EP 12
programme.desc: Hosted by Bai Xinyi, this food programme introduces Taiwan's traditional cuisines and their ingredients and spices. It also discloses touching stories behind the cuisines. 介绍台湾在地食材的故事，也是台湾最深刻的人生故事。故事的主角们，有的为着有机农业奋斗打拼，为这片土地奉献青春与血汗。 有的则是经过千百次的调味与尝试，只为了成就一道美味料理。对比着经营者与料理人的故事，他们或是为生活中年转业、或是离乡背井追寻梦想，人生路上各自遭逢百转千折的冲突与适应，才能在逆境中成功蜕变。.

programme.title: 回转干探 Life On Mars - EP 21
programme.desc: Taizhu bumps into Jin Xianshuo who got away from him in 1988. The latter could not recognize him, so Taizhu reminds him of the killing of his father. (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(双声道-中/韩)泰柱与在1988 年逃离他手掌下的金贤硕对碰，但后者已对泰柱没印象。泰柱提醒他当年杀害他父亲的事件。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 你也是人类吗 Are You Human - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Xiaofeng follows Yongxun covertly to the hospital and is shocked to see someone resembling Nanxin hospitalised. She reports it to Zhongji. Yongxun informs Lula that they have to move the unconscious human Nanxin to another place as Xiaofeng has discovered their whereabouts. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)小凤偷偷跟踪永勋到医院，很震惊地看到有另一个看起来像南信的人被送进医院， 她向钟吉汇报。 永勋通知露拉他们得尽快将昏迷的人类南信移去别的地方，小风已发现他们的行踪了。.

programme.title: 你也是人类吗 Are You Human - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Yongxun tells Xiaofeng that Cao, the reporter, has confessed to him that they are moles for Zhongji. He promises Xiaofeng a higher reward for not breathing a word about it but Xiaofeng rejects him. Lula has no choice but to tell Xiaofeng what Zhongji has done to harm Nanxin. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)永勋告诉小凤，曹记者已向他坦白她们给钟吉做卧底的事了，并许诺会给更高的报酬希望小凤不要将此事透漏出去，但小凤没有答应。露拉不得已，只好将钟吉害南信的坏事都告诉了小凤。.

programme.title: 加油！向未来 Eureka Moment China - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) "Eureka Moment China" is an explosive and larger than life game show in which two couples go head to head testing their knowledge and coming face to face with a raft of dangerous stunts and wacky experiments. (重)《加油！向未来》是中央电视台推出的科学实验节目，由央视创造传媒有限公司制作。节目共11期，由撒贝宁、张腾岳主持，邓楚涵为解题人。每期节目明星将和观众代表一起，通过实验竞赛，为加油队和未来队赢取科学奖励，获胜队将赢得当期最终大奖（北极圈科考之旅）。.

programme.title: 有故事的店 Shop Stories - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) A young girl inherits the family's bicycle business, strives for a spot in the male dominated bicycle kingdom. Born to a family in leather business but ends up designing and producing high heels shoes. An advertising executive makes career switch to turn daily necessities into jewellery art pieces. (重)女人在男人世界里闯荡，男人在女人王国打转。年轻女生继承家族脚车生意，想在男人操控的脚车王国里找到立足点。皮革世家出身，最终竟设计女生高跟鞋。广告公司高层中年转业，把日常用品变成艺术品。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) In an attempt to win back Hulk, Pepper decides to secretly video record and document her army training phase. She plans to broadcast to the world (and to Hulk) how she will go through anything in order to win back her man. However, she later gets caught by Sergeant Ong for using her phone during training. Sergeant Ong decides to make Pepper learn a hard lesson by not only punishing her but the entire platoon as well. (PG)(重)Rose和Pepper的platoon mate，小欣，查了许多何欣怡的资料，发现她文武双全，拿过许多奖项。Pepper恐怕再怎么努力也打不过她。Pepper为此沮丧，可又想到了别的方法。竟然赢不了，那就让全世界知道自己多可怜。Pepper因为在受训时拿手机拍照，结果被Sergeant Ong处罚，连累了整个platoon。.

programme.title: 长命百二岁 第一辑 As Long As You Live S1 - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Award-winning programme "As Long As You Live" takes a look at how countries face the ageing population and what measures do they take to care for them. (重)全球人口老化，「长命百岁」已经过时，活到百二岁是迟早的事。究竟是祝福，还是诅咒？本台老中青三代记者走访多个亚洲地区包括香港，台湾，日本，南韩，了解他们对人口老化的看法。.

programme.title: 人间蒸发 Missing - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) Last September, a tsunami swept across the city of Palu, Indonesia. Many were dead, while many went missing. Some bodies were not recovered and families continue to search for hope. A year of silence, a year of searching, and a year of waiting in anxiousness. But how long can this hope last? (重)去年九月，一场无情的海啸让许多印度尼西亚帕卢市居民家破人亡。这场灾害造成多人伤亡，至今仍有多人下落不明。对有些家属来说，只能无限的等待和寻找，因为遗体未被发现，就是一线希望。.

programme.title: 上食堂 Food Notes - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) Dumplings and buns can be found everywhere in China, but why are gourmands so hung up about the piping-hot soup dumplings found in Shanghai? Just how many varieties are there? And what is the best way to eat soup dumplings? Find out more about the allure of this collagen-rich dish on Food Notes. (重)节目让观众大快朵颐之际，也深入了解这些美食背后各个幕后英雄是如何让眼前的美食发扬光大。除了介绍各个厨师、馆子是如何使出十八般武艺烹煮美食外，节目也会将镜头转向养殖场、捕捞过程及相关行业，让观众更全面和深入的了解，这些美食的过去、现在甚至将来！.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 79
programme.desc: (R) Xizhen feels bad for Meina and Tongbai when she hears that Yuncan has gone for match-making sessions again. Yiyuan is envious of the good relationship between Haixiu and Shanying. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)熙真听说允灿又去相亲了，觉得美娜和桐白可怜，于是想到了一个妙计。艺苑听说海秀是为了守护母亲，当初才向她低头，非常羡慕善英和海秀之间的感情。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 80
programme.desc: (R) Xizhen arranges for Yuncan to meet up with Meina. Yuncan does not understand Xizhen's intention and mistakes Meina for playing a trick on him. Shanying regains consciousness soon after the operation, but Haixiu remains unconscious. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)熙真想撮合允灿和美娜，于是安排美娜跟允灿相亲。允灿却认定是美娜要跟他复合才拜托熙真为他们安排相亲，与美娜闹得不欢而散。善英在手术后很快就苏醒，但海秀却迟迟没有醒来，情况也不稳定。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) Zai Can feels pressured working on Du Herong's case. Meanwhile, Lawyer Li Youfan proffers Du Herong's blemished records to Hong Zhu hoping she can publish them. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)应付都鹤荣档个案，宰璨大受压力。律师李侑凡故意把都鹤荣在学校的一系列打架斗殴记录资料交给红珠，希望她能爆出这些资料。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Du Herong is cleared of killing Liu Xiujing and the citizens are unhappy with the verdict. Zai Can is accused of dereliction of duty for letting off a murderer. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)都鹤荣被判无罪而释放，人民大表不满，指责宰璨无能，释放都鹤荣逍遥法外。.

programme.title: 声音的抉择 Singing Choice - EP 5
programme.desc: A music variety where the singer will compose a song and find the right voice to sing it. Featuring singers such as Li Quan, Gary Chaw, Jam Hsiao, Kenji Wu, A-Niu etc. 《声音的抉择》每两期会邀请一位华语乐坛制作人化身声音委托人来到现场，阐述自己的创作理念及择声的标准，通过这个平台为自己最新创作的优质单曲寻找契合的好声音；与此同时，每期节目中声音猎人推荐六位职业歌手，他们作为金曲试唱人站上《声音的抉择》的舞台向声音委托人和观众展示其真挚的歌声，同时借助这个平台寻找契合自己声音的旋律、寻找下一首成名曲。.

programme.title: 怪食记 Weird Food Diaries - EP 5
programme.desc: In "Weird Food Diaries", avid foodie Rosalyn Lee (also known as Rozz) goes in search of Asia's most bizarre eats. Rozz eats away across Japan, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, Korea, Indonesia and the Philippines. Whether it's exotic street food or haute cuisine, Rozz is hungry to try it all! In this episode, there's never a dull moment in her weird food quest in the Taiwan. (PG-部分画面令人不安)在“怪食记"中，狂热的美食家Rosalyn Lee（也称为Rozz）正在寻找亚洲最奇异的食物。Rozz在日本，越南，柬埔寨，台湾，泰国，韩国，印度尼西亚和菲律宾各地旅行,并尝试当地街头奇异美食还是高级美食。在这一集中，她将带大家去台湾品尝当地的奇怪的食物。.

programme.title: 偷天任务 Leverage - EP 11
programme.desc: Taijun worries about the safety of the team because of the medical lawsuit case. He asks the team to lay low for the time being. He pretends not to know about his best friend and ex-boss' involvement in the case. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)太骏因医疗官司案件的关系而担心团队的安全,要团员们保持低调。他假装不知道自己的好友俊亨和前任老板哲修涉及这场医疗官司案。.

programme.title: 看见看不见的你 I See You - EP 11
programme.desc: Having uncovered the identity of the person responsible for Kai En's condition, Shi Ping and Kai En investigate further. However, unknown to them, their investigations will put the ones closest to them in grave danger. (PG-灵异题材)好不容易有了关于加害凯恩的人的线索，世平和凯恩决定继续追查真相。始料未及的是，他们的追查，却让他们身边至亲的人陷入危险。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.desc: (R) A music variety where the singer will compose a song and find the right voice to sing it. Rozz eats away across Japan, Vietnam, Cambodia, Taiwan, Thailand, Korea, Indonesia and the Philippines. Whether it's exotic street food or haute cuisine, Rozz is hungry to try it all! In this episode, there's never a dull moment in her weird food quest in the Taiwan. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)在“怪食记"中，狂热的美食家Rosalyn Lee（也称为Rozz）正在寻找亚洲最奇异的食物。Rozz在日本，越南，柬埔寨，台湾，泰国，韩国，印度尼西亚和菲律宾各地旅行,并尝试当地街头奇异美食还是高级美食。在这一集中，她将带大家去台湾品尝当地的奇怪的食物。.

programme.title: 太阳的后裔 Descendants Of The Sun - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) Daying wanted to break up with Yin Mingzhu after her father, who is an army general, forced Daying to leave her. Jiang Muyan wanted to operate on an Arab minister after he showed life-threatening illness but the minister's bodyguards interfered. Luckily Liu Shizhen arrived in time to protect Jiang. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)尹明珠因将军父亲不许她与大英来往，命令两人分手，大英自认配不起明珠，只好服从命令。阿拉伯联盟议长身体出现症状，姜暮研认为议长需做手术，但被议长的保镖阻拦。刘时镇挺身保护暮烟。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 Puzzle Masters - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters" is a reality-cum-variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brainpower. Wang Feng, Wang Yuhang and Bao Yun serve as team leaders. Tao Jingying is invited as the resident guest of the programme. (重)“最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑"邀具备非凡脑力的天才上节目进行各项挑战，并以科学的方式分析各高手的能力.节目由蒋昌建主持，王峰、王昱行和鲍雲担任队长，陶晶莹则受邀当常驻嘉宾。.

programme.title: 太自游 Funtastic - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) Funtastic is a travelogue with a difference, various artistes in each episode who will bring viewers to their favourite travel destinations. They will introduce unique local specialties and interact with the locals. What's more, the artistes will be put to the test to overcome obstacles along the journey or undertake activities they have never attempted before. (重)非一般的旅行，绝对刺激的新体验！李腾，许立桦，谢宛谕和李玲带你探索泰国鲜为人知的旅游宝地，教你如何尽情享受自由旅行之乐，成为一个真正的泰国自游达人！.

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) This episode, Pornsak learns about the cultivation of garlic & has a taste of black garlic dishes in Australia. He also experiences the brewing of vinegar at a century-old vinegar factory in Taiwan. Cui Fang learns about the production of kimchi in Korea & secrets of mud crab farming in Philippines. (重)在这一集节目中，Pornsak 前往澳大利亚了解大蒜的种植并品尝黑蒜菜肴，他也去到了台湾百年醋厂，体验香醋的酿造。林翠芳则前往韩国了解韩国最具代表性的食材之一泡菜的制作，并到菲律宾一窥青蟹的养殖奥秘。.

programme.title: 奇异特工 Odd-upation - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) Le Nez, Nose is another term for a perfumer. Their inspiration and creativity determine a perfumes character, personality, and trend. A professional perfumer needs to be familiar with more than 2000 ingredients. How does one achieve such a super nose? Let's find out more with the host in France. (重)Le Nez，‘鼻子'是闻香师的别称。他们的灵感和创意决定了香水的品格、个性和潮流。专业的闻香师必须熟悉超过两千种原料。这样的“超级鼻子"是怎么练成的？请跟随奇异特工黄靖伦到法国一探究竟。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) They live in a tropical paradise - a tranquil community set in picture perfect crystal clear waters and blue skies - far from the mire and corrupting distractions of urban life. They are the Bajau Sea Nomads of Sabah. Through generations, the sea has provided fully for them. But this is changing. There is now a meagre supply of fish and there are new needs with the encroachment of modernity. (重)六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 整形背后 Plastic Surgery Is My Business - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) The competition for business between aesthetic doctors and plastic surgeons is getting tough. On top of that, Vincent and his team must keep in line with strict medical regulations that limit the type and reach of clinical advertising. What can Vincent's clinic do in the face of strong competition? (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)整形外科医生与医学美容医生的商业竞争越来越强。身为整形外科专家，姚国龙医生和他的团队必须遵守严格的医药条例。这无形中限制了诊所的宣传方式与范围。面对强烈的竞争，姚国龙医生有何对策？.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 81
programme.desc: (R) Xiuzi finds out that Yiyuan wants to distance herself from Yuzhen's family after marriage. Realizing that Yiyuan is not a sincere person, Xiuzi tells Yuzhen not to marry Yiyuan. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)秀子听到艺苑跟贵熙的对话，发现艺苑其实不是真心对待他们，而是想用钱收买人心，然后在与宇真结婚后渐渐地跟夫家的家人划清界限。秀子深思熟虑后叫宇真不要跟艺苑结婚。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 82
programme.desc: (R) The agent who was managing Wancai previously looks him up again. Xiuzi realises that the agent most probably wants to cheat Wancai again and alerts Wancai and Haocai to bring the agent to the police station. Wancai is relieved when his contract with the fraudulent agent is void. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)之前想骗万才的社长看到网络视频后主动联络万才。秀子看穿社长想再次欺骗万才，于是要万才和浩才把社长带到警局去。万才的奴隶合约废止，还很可能收取之前没有拿到的酬劳，万才终于放下心中大石。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 13
programme.desc: (R) Lawyer Li Youfan instigates Liu Xiujing's father to consider revenge on Zai Can. Hong Zhu s dream comes true when Zai Can is shot by Liu Xiujing's father at a traffic junction. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)律师李侑凡故意煽动柳秀景父亲的情绪，称宰璨是徇私情才放了都鹤荣，令柳秀景的父亲顿起杀意。红珠梦见宰璨被伤害的梦境真实现实现。.

programme.title: 当你沉睡时 While You Were Sleeping - EP 14
programme.desc: (R) Zai Can is glad that Hong Zhu is the person he met 13 years ago. Although their time together was short, her impression of him is deep in his heart. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宰璨十三年前在葬礼上见过的栗子竟是红珠，心感惊喜。和栗子度过的时间虽然短暂，但对他印象很深刻。.

programme.title: 我想和你唱3 Come Sing With Me 3 - EP 10
programme.desc: An interactive music variety show where ordinary people have an opportunity to sing together with celebrity pop singers. First, the celebrity pop singers featured in that episode (there are usually three total) are shown singing one of their well-known songs in the studio. Fans are shown singing along simultaneously in UGC clips showing people singing into their computers or mobile phones from wherever they are. Some are shown singing into their headphones from their offices, etc. 《我想和你唱第三季》除了继续延续前两季“星素同框同台合唱"的核心节目模式，还将星素互动环节进行了升级。该节目嘉宾阵容相比前两季会更年轻化，更多90后、00后喜爱的偶像都会参与进来。节目中新增的CALLOUT环节，邀请的大来宾会亲自电话邀请三位幸运观众，请他们24小时之内赶到录制现场，获得10秒同唱机会。.

programme.title: 偷天任务 Leverage - EP 12
programme.desc: Taijun secretly gathers the team once again and sets a trap for Cao Junheng and Jin Nanyin using the Misa Construction CEO, Cui Shili as bait. However, Sujng recognizes Cui Shili as Cui Yingzi, a legendary swindler. The team now faces a challenge - how to con a legendary swindler? (PG)(双声道-中/韩)太骏再次秘密地召集团员，并利用美司建设的首席执行官崔世莉为诱饵，设置了陷阱让曹俊亨和金南英上当。 但是，穗京发现崔世莉实际上是传奇的骗子崔英子。 团队现在面临挑战 -要如何对付那位传奇女骗子？.

programme.title: 看见看不见的你 I See You - EP 12
programme.desc: 748 becomes involved in Kai En's quest for the truth: in order to let her complete her mission, he must bend the rules and put himself at risk. Meanwhile, Shi Ping decides to risk everything to help Kai En. But it could result in tragic consequences for both of them. (PG-灵异题材)748被牵扯进凯恩寻找身体的案件中。他必须折衷，改变自己做事的原则，甚至以身犯险地让凯恩完成任务。同时，世平决定不顾一切，势要帮凯恩找回身体。但是这样可能会让两人万劫不复。.

programme.title: I'm Madam! - EP 4

programme.title: 食材地图 Our Daily Food - EP 11
programme.desc: This episode, Cui Fang learns how farmers use sawtooth oak to cultivate wild black fungus in Yunnan and also oyster farming in Philippines. Pornsak experiences wasabi harvesting in Japan and mussel harvesting in Australia. He is also in Thailand to harvest bamboo shoots and make sour bamboo shoots. 这一集节目中，林翠芳来到中国云南了解菌农如何利用麻栎木培育野生黑木耳。接着，她也前往菲律宾了解牡蛎的养殖。Pornsak在日本体验山葵的采收，并在澳大利亚参与贻贝的收成，他也到泰国采收竹笋，制作酸笋。.

programme.title: 你也是人类吗 Are You Human - EP 9
programme.desc: When Yongxun learns Yina has already found out Nanxin III's identity, he has no choice but to bring Yina to where the human Nanxin is hiding. Lula tells her the truth that Zhongji has sent someone to assassinate Nanxin. Yina looks at Nanxin on the bed and cries. In her heart, Nanxin is even more important than herself. 当永勋知艺娜已发现南信3号的身份后，只好把艺娜带到人类南信藏身的秘密住址。露拉把钟吉派人杀害南信的真相都告诉了她。艺娜看到病床上的南信，伤心地哭起来，在她心里，南信比她自己更重要。.

programme.title: 你也是人类吗 Are You Human - EP 10
programme.desc: Chairman Nan explains to Zhongji that he intends to forgive his betrayal. Zhongji expresses that he will play his part as Nanxin's father-in-law in future. In actual fact, Zhongji has not let the issue go. He asks Xiaofeng about her seeing two Nanxins lately and sends a killer to continue tracking down Nanxin. 南会长与钟吉说明自己有意放过他背叛的事，钟吉也表示以后会安份地做好南信的丈人；但他实际上仍然不甘心，还向小凤打听之前看到两个南信的事，还派杀手继续追查南信的事情。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 5
programme.desc: The New People's Army in Philippines is listed as a terrorist organisation by USA and Philippines and it has been estimated of claiming 30,000 lives during rebellion. In recent years, many members have abandoned their weapons. Does this act mean a loss of trust in justice or turning over a new leaf? 在菲律宾，有个叫NPA的新人民军的组织，被美国和菲律宾列为恐怖组织，据军方估计，该组织的叛乱已夺走三万人性命，近年有不少的组织成员弃械投降。 器械投诚到底是对正义之名失去信任，还是想重新开始呢？.

programme.title: 拜托了，妈妈 All About My Mom - EP 35
programme.desc: Ep 37: Jin Guanglie beats up Hengkui at his office. Thereafter, Guanglie calls Huizhu. He wants Huizhu to resign immediately or he will deal with Hengkui more severely.Ep 38: Yingshan brings Nanshu to Dongchu's house to pack Xuncai's belongings. Zhen-ai tries to stop Yingshan to force Xuncai to move back home. Yingshan tells Zhen-ai outright that she dislikes her. Shanyu overhears their conversation and feels very upset. Ep 37: 金光烈在深夜到律师事务所打亨奎。过后，金光烈拨电给惠珠，告诉她已经教训了亨奎一番，要惠珠马上辞职，否则会更加严厉对付亨奎。Ep 38: 英善带着南淑到李家收拾勋才的行李，要逼勋才离开李家。真爱赶回家阻止。英善直言不喜欢真爱当勋才的女友以及她的媳妇人选。英善的话被珊玉听到。珊玉觉得心痛。.

programme.title: 嫉妒的化身 Jealousy Incarnate - EP 24
programme.desc: Ep 31Huaxin disappears after he disclosed publicly that he is the one suffering from the breast cancer. Nali is very worried. A week later, Huaxin returns to the TV station to tell Nali that he wants to break off but cannot bring himself to say it. He is upset about it. Huaxin faces the consequence of getting transferred due to improper use of words while reading the news.Ep 32Huaxin wants to marry Nali and plans to schedule their wedding on christmas eve. Both are agonising over the choic Ep 31对外公开自己是乳腺癌患者的身份后，华信便突然消失了，令娜丽十分担心。一星期后华信回电视台去找娜丽要跟她说分手，却因无法开口而焦心。华信在播报新闻时因为用语不当而面临被调动的危机。Ep 32华信想和娜丽结婚，并想把婚礼安排在圣诞节的晚上。两人为婚礼该找谁来做司仪而发愁。局长为了阻止华信辞职，派他去主持晚间一档健康手册的电台节目，让他可以想说什么就说什么。.

programme.title: 爸不得爱你 Father, I'll Take Care Of You - EP 42
programme.desc: After their 4 children become independent, an old couple decide to live for themselves. One day, their 4 children come back to them. Starring Lee Hyun Woo, Han Jung Eun, Lee Tae Hwan and Park Eun Bin. (双声道-中/韩)讲述了离家各过各的生活的四兄妹在突然某一天同时回到家中而展开的故事。金载沅将饰演世界级投资公司代表出身的工地现场所长李贤宇，朴恩彬饰演梦想着成为作家，却因哥哥的债务而被奴隶合同束缚的助理作家吴彤熙。此外，李泰焕则饰演大企业的本部长韩成俊，李秀卿饰演拥有旅行作家、歌手、作词家、塔罗牌占星家等多重身份的韩廷恩。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 12
programme.desc: For months, the battle raged between pro-ISIS rebels and government forces. When the sounds of war and death finally subsided, large swathes of Marawi are in ruins and its displaced population are left to pick up the pieces. Facing up to the challenge is Dr Baimona Dimakuta, who is reaching out to help as many of her fellow countrymen as possible. Our host, Khai Saharom travels to Marawi - delivering vital medical equipment to help the good doctor in her outreach. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.desc: Want to know how to make Tau Suan? Stay tuned to watch Chef Ariffin and Magalakshimi on Super Samayal 3.

programme.title: Anjaraipetti Sr 7 - EP 252
programme.desc: Anjaraipetti takes cookery onto a new level, transforming the foodies into passionate chefs. The show helps viewers hone their culinary skills and brings a new flavour to their kitchen, different from the ones they are used to.

programme.title: Priyasakhi - EP 232
programme.desc: 'Priyasakhi' is about the life of Dhivya. She has parents who are uncaring and partial, siblings who are jealous and cunning, husband who married her just for challenge and thrill, and in-laws who are unsympathetic and refuse to endorse the marriage.

programme.title: Ishq Ka Rang Safed - EP 0312&0313
programme.desc: Ishq Ka Rang Safed is set amidst the traditional old city of Banaras in Northern India. Biplab is the carefree, spoilt grandson of the town leader who is slated to go abroad for his law studies. His life takes an abrupt turn when he encounters Dhaani. Dhaani, a young widow leading a life of dignity abiding by her Dharma is a conformist, yet a strong minded individual.

programme.title: Motu Patlu 3 - EP 64
programme.desc: Motu and Patlu, two friends living in Furfuri Naga, have a penchant to land themselves in comical situations, later rescuing themselves only by sheer luck. A criminal named John, intends to become a don, but his plans always fail due to the heroic actions of Motu and Patlu, who trap and expose him and his plans.

programme.title: Theriyatha Tamil Cinema 3 - Thirai Isai Paadalgal(HD) - EP 28
